title: Make Cortex Orchestrator Intelligent for Chat Queries
description: Implement natural language query processing in Cortex orchestrator to handle chat app requests intelligently
requirements: Add Claude/AI capability to Cortex orchestrator
Route to appropriate systems (kubectl, UniFi MCP, Wazuh MCP, Proxmox MCP)
Return user-friendly answers instead of raw kubectl output
Implement tool execution for kubectl, MCP servers, masters

implementation_spec.location: kubectl get cm -n cortex cortex-chat-integration-spec -o yaml

test_queries: how is my unifi network today?
what pods are running in cortex-system?
what VMs are running on proxmox?
success_criteria: User asks 'how is my unifi network today?' → Cortex routes to UniFi MCP
User asks 'what pods are running?' → Cortex executes kubectl
User asks 'any security alerts?' → Cortex routes to Wazuh MCP
Responses are natural language, not raw JSON/kubectl dumps
No token loops - one query, one answer
